duties_responsibilities.duty: Resolve day-to-day issues for external clients and direct them to appropriate resources at BNY Mellon.
Support clients in addressing operational and technical questions or issues and ensuring requests are executed.
Apply problem-solving skills based on precedence and experience.
Deliver high-quality service to a specialized client base and provide clients information related to BNY Mellon products and services.
Participate in internal activities and initiatives designed to improve the client experience.
No direct reports. Support a selected number of client accounts of limited complexity.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or the equivalent combination of education and experience is required. 0-3 years of total work experience preferred. Experience in an operational area and/or client services preferred.
